string-array.name: situationMeanings
string-array.item: Feeling or characterized by uncontrollable fear or anxiety.
Full of life and energy; active and outgoing.
In a state of unhappiness or despondency.
Suffering from psychological or emotional problems.
Feeling or showing anger, hurt, or resentment because of bad experiences or a sense of unjust treatment.
Feeling or showing worry, nervousness, or unease about something with an uncertain outcome.
Anxious or troubled about actual or potential problems.
Showing or involving great activity or vitality.
Feeling or showing strong annoyance, displeasure, or hostility; full of anger.
Engaging or ready to engage in physically energetic pursuits.
In need of sleep or rest; weary.
The state of being watchful for possible danger.
Not completely confident or sure of something.
